DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect intravenous human recombinant erythropoietin reperfusion injury primary percutaneous coronary intervention patient acute myocardial infarction .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Erythropoietin Time Reperfusion Acute Myocardial Infarction
DOC.criteria: Acute myocardial infarction < 12hr Age > 18yrs First myocardial infarction culprit lesion : proximal mid leave anterior descend artery Baseline coronary flow : TIMI Grade 0~1 Patients previous myocardial infarction History thrombotic complication History cerebral infarction Uncontrolled hypertension Increased hemoglobin level > 17g/dL Patients mechanical valve Cardiogenic shock
